root.name: Stryker's Run
root.description: OverviewStryker's Run is a side-scrolling action game developed and published by Superior Software for the BBC Micro and Acorn Electron platforms.PlotCommander Stryker has acquired information which reveals a weakness in the enemies defenses. The information is too critical to broadcast back to base, so Stryker takes on the task of relaying it back to base personally. GameplayThe player takes control of Commander Stryker in his quest to relay important information. Stryker can be moved from side to side and jump, shoot a laser, and throw grenades. Throughout the course of the game there are various enemy air vehicles that can be taken over to help get to the base.
